Detailed Description

QuartusGenerator generates a Quartus project for the component.

Generator creates two files:

  • .qpf file which is the quartus project file
  • .qsf file which contains list of needed files and possibly pin assignments for an FPGA board.

void QuartusGenerator::generateProject ( QString  outputPath,
const QString &  top_entity 
)

Generate the Quartus project files (.qpf .qsf).

This function takes the output directory path and creates two files there:

  • Quartus settings file
  • Quartus project file

The files are named after the top component's name.
